bio: DEV Solidity PHP Javascript HTML, Dev frontend + GitHub Star, Cryptotrader ðŸ“ˆ
contributionDescription:
Since the first months of Optimism I have tested and given feedback to many projects in the ecosystem to identify errors and have better usability, I have educated other users on how to use Optimism and the advantages it offers in terms of lower fees and faster transactions.
I have participated in hackathons and contests.
I am a user of dApps and services built in Optimism, so I promote their adoption among my friends and the communities to which I belong.
impactDescription: I participate in hackathons, contests and governance votes, I use services built on Optimism on a daily basis and I promote their adoption among my friends. I would like to contribute with a higher commitment, I have a lot of free time every day so I can dedicate myself fully to collaborating with the adoption of Optimims in my city
pwCategorySuggestions: Developer Ecosystem, User Experience & Adoption, Blockchain Education, End-User Experience, Community Building
